title: sagarbansal21
author: sagarbansal21
content: Are you ready to tune into the new Diving into Crypto Session with AdLunam?This time, we have our guest James Ling, COO of Viral Ventures, joining us for the discussion on the topic ' VCs as Value Creators' tomorrow Aug 4, at 3 PM CET.Learn more: https://twitter.com/AdLunamInc/status/1554163227407405056?s=20&t=JYM7gI7Qdl57injGN41k0A

comments.author: sagarbansal21
comments.body: Most people think that Venture capital is all about investments; and to be a great VC you need to allocate your best resources to the investment process in order to attract the best possible opportunities, perform the best possible due diligence etc. Meet their guest James Ling, COO of Viral Ventures today by joining the AdLunam team discussing the topic 'VCs as Value Creators.Time: Aug 4, 2022 | 3 PM CET Venue: https://twitter.com/i/spaces/1mnxedADnONJX
